briefTitle: Open-Label Study of Diclofenac Capsules to Treat Osteoarthritis Pain
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-Label, Safety Study of Diclofenac [Test] Capsules in Subjects With Osteoarthritis of the Knee or Hip

arms.label: Diclofenac Capsules 35 mg bid or tid

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of Diclofenac \[Test\] Capsules for the treatment of osteoarthritis pain of the knee or hip.

primaryOutcome.measure: Safety of Diclofenac 35 mg Capsules as Assessed by the Incidence of Adverse Events From Baseline to Week 52 or Early Termination
